hero.title: Ace Your Next
hero.description: Your personal AI interview coach. Smart resume parsing, realistic mock interviews, and real-time code assessment with feedback.

features.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
features.subtitle: Comprehensive tools designed to help you master technical interviews and land your dream job.

resumeAnalysis.title: Deep Resume Analysis
resumeAnalysis.description: AI-powered resume parsing that identifies strengths and gaps in your profile, with personalized recommendations for improvement.

multiMode.title: Multi-Mode Interview
multiMode.description: Practice with voice or text-based interviews. Adaptive AI adjusts difficulty based on your performance and learning pace.

smartScoring.title: Smart Scoring Report
smartScoring.description: Detailed performance analytics with real-time feedback. Track your progress across technical skills, communication, and problem-solving.

codeAssessment.title: Live Code Assessment
codeAssessment.description: Real-time code evaluation with syntax checking, best practices analysis, and optimization suggestions during mock interviews.

voiceMode.title: Voice Interview Mode
voiceMode.description: Natural conversation flow with speech recognition. Practice your verbal communication skills just like a real interview.

achievement.title: Achievement System
achievement.description: Stay motivated with milestones, badges, and progress tracking. Celebrate your improvement journey with tangible rewards.

socialProof.description: Join thousands of successful candidates who landed their dream jobs

footer.brandDesc: AI-powered interview preparation platform helping tech professionals land their dream jobs.
